lines.content: This is a project for a greenfield Java project. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 17, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 17** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

1. After that, locate the `src/main/java/Hokmah.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run Hokmah.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
What can I do for you?

**Warning:** Keep the `src\main\java` folder as the root folder for Java files (i.e., don't rename those folders or move Java files to another folder outside of this folder path), as this is the default location some tools (e.g., Gradle) expect to find Java files.

If you don't know what to ask you can use the 'help' command""");
System.out.println("Here is what I can do:");
String taskList = "list\n\t(Shows all the tasks in the list)\n" +
"todo [name]\n\t(Adds a todo task to the task list)\n" +
"deadline [name] /by [time]\n\t(Adds a deadline task to the task list)\n" +
"event [name] /from [start time] /to [end time]\n\t(Adds a event task to the task list)\n" +
"mark [task number]\n\t (Marks the task at [task number] in the task list as completed)" +
"unmark [task number]\n\t (Marks the task at [task number] in the task list as incomplete)" +
"delete [task number]\n\t (Deletes the task at [task number] in the task list)" +
"bye\n\t(Only if you want to leave. It's not like I wanted you to be here.)";
String message = "Goodbye! I hope you come back soon!";
message = "Just what are you going to do? Can you at least tell me the name?";
message = "Ok so? When is the deadline by? Try again but by adding /by [time]";
message = "I don't know when your event will start and end? Can you try again but by adding /from [start_time] /to [end_time]";
message = "I don't know when your event will end? Can you try again but by adding /to [time]";
message = "The task you are trying to perform an action on cannot be found. Are you sure you put the right task id?";
message = "Something went wrong.. This should not happen!";
event reading fair /from monday morning /to monday evening
